post_title: Imperial: -felps
donk 1v5 w/ keystrokes visualized
Was messing around in Train and apparently you can shoot through this
FaZe documentary: The Most Unpredictable Player in Counter-Strike History
dev1ce back in 2025; br0 contract is terminated
xertioN: "Mentally, we're at a completely different level now. We're much more comfortable to play on stage"
Am I being crazy ?
post_body:
It looks like the game is randomly desyncing, it can happen multiple times in a match, or not at all, and it's driving me nuts. When it happens, winning a spray duel feels impossible, kill confirmation is late, rubberbanding is present etc. I stopped playing because of this in february/march, and rebuilt my PC before I started playing again, and it wasn't an issue for some time, then it started again.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zd2RjHsJqE8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zd2RjHsJqE8)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OFO-fpD9n3E](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OFO-fpD9n3E)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-eBMK7c4NU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-eBMK7c4NU)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RLBFlI3itzQ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RLBFlI3itzQ)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bo120GxqfJI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bo120GxqfJI)

I tried following:

* **rate 1000000**
* **tweaking with settings but to no avail**
* **reinstalling CS2**
* **driver update**
* **DDU then installing drivers with NVCleanstall**
* [www.waveform.com/tools/bufferbloat](https://www.waveform.com/tools/bufferbloat)
* [packagelosstest.com](http://packagelosstest.com)

PC Specs:

**CPU:** AMD Ryzen 7 5700X  
**GPU:** NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Super  
**RAM:** 32GB HyperX Fury DDR4 (3200MHz)

Also, I noticed that package loss/jitter jumps all the time, but only in CS2.

post_title: Start CS2 Servers in under 5 minutes, without leaving your Discord Server!
post_body:
Yo gamers,

Like you, i like gaming, but setting up a server? Not so much.

Last year, my friends and I just wanted to play some CS2, but instead, we spent hours fighting with server setup. After that, we decided to try solving that issue.

Now, we have built a Discord bot that automates the server setup process. And we would love for you to try it out and limit-test/give feedback to us. Hopefully you’ll be gaming with your friends in no time. **It’s free, easy, and ready to use!**

If you want to try it you can check it out on [https://slashplay.gg](https://slashplay.gg)

If you want we would appreciate some feedback on either our Discord or in the comments.

Thanks in advance, and happy gaming!

Im sorry if this post is not allowed - you can remove it.

post_title: Cloud II or Sennheiser/Audiotechnica for CS2
post_body:
Hey, I need new headphones, and I am probably going to get a Cloud 2 wired. But there's a possiblity that I might have the budget to get an ATH-m50x or a HD 599 SE, would it be worth it for CS2 and occasional music listening and playing other games?

I have a standalone mic btw, I would only require the headphones. I tought about the Cloud 2 because it's half the price as the others I mentioned and seems to be the standart choice for competitive FPS, but if the others are REALLY worth it paying double the price than I might go for them.

post_title: I can't move my camera
post_body:
it is locked like it had 0 sensibility, although I have 3.0 sensiblity. i can move with WASD and all, but not move the camera with the mouse

this happened after i used "unbindall" command to reset a random command i inputed for antiafk spinbot (i had bad stomack). now i absolutely cannot play at all and i have no clue on what to do.

i just tried to on/off the "Revert Mouse" and it solved only the vertical movement, but i still can't move horizontally. help, please 😢

post_title: Mirage was the most played map in Shanghai Elimination Stage while Vertigo the least.
Lack of mics is killing me
post_body:
10-15k premier and I reckon only every second person have a microphone.

It shocks me, is it not clearly a teamwork based game? How do you even get to 15k premier not using a mic or working with your teammates in any way?

It’s not like people can’t afford mics because they’ll have a fancy knife but no mic?

Drives me crazy. This is in OCE region, is it the same in others?

Edit: I should clarify that half the time they have a mic but they never use it in game. They don’t say hello back at the start of the match when I say it to everyone and they don’t respond to any of my questions mid game, but then they say “gg” over the mic at the end. So they could have spoken the whole time they just choose not to, what’s with this mindset?

post_title: Obligatory 'what you see is what you get.'

post_body:
Wanted to give credit where its due.
